meanings.sent1: Her views on gender equality were clearly antifeminine.
meanings.sent2: The movie portrayed the villain as an antifeminine character.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit humorously depicted an antifeminine superhero trying to save the day.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds in the sky seemed to have an antifeminine presence, blocking out the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The artist used bold, sharp lines to create an antifeminine aesthetic in her painting.

meanings.definition: Not characteristic of or suitable for women.
meanings.sent1: The rugged boots had an antifeminine look to them.
meanings.sent2: The sports car's design was sleek and antifeminine.
meanings.sent3: The fluffy pink dress looked completely antifeminine on the tough biker.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the engine had an antifeminine roar that echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The harsh, metallic scent of the machinery filled the room with an antifeminine aroma.
